::Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

    Optimus saw the images, he=
 couldn't belive it. Gavlatron was back, and had killed his brother. Optimu=
s had much to do before he could even think about Galvatron. And because of=
 the link between Galvatron and Prime, he knew that Galvatron would go afte=
r his sucessor. He had to get there first.
    "We're on a time sechedule,"=
 Prime said to the other three bots. "I am going to the Cybertronian Fire. =
Please accompany me."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: kinger01030@c=
s.com 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, January 31, 2001 7:=
00 PM
  Subject: Comm to Optimus


  Galvatron felt a pain fill Optimus. Th=
ey held a special link for eons. He 
  sent a hologram image of himself. "H=
ello my old friend. He showed a picture 
  of Magnus's last moments..."Your=
 brother's spark is mine! You will be next!" 
  He flew  and landed infront=
 of the Destron base. He walked in and looked at 
  the photograph he had t=
aken of the map. he found a suitable room. He layed on 
  the floor and sle=
pt. Guiledart and Megatrom by his side guarding him.
